name: TheCryptoMarketplace
0:
”Alexa, launch the Crypto Marketplace”
”Alexa, open the Crypto Marketplace”
”Alexa, ask the Crypto Marketplace for the price of Bitcoin”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the crypto marketplace
des: Allows anyone to access the current, real time price of any Cryptocurrency, in U.S. Dollars. Ideal for anyone that trades in the Cryptocurrency market, or is just curious what the price is.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
